feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, over 16 years running.

entry.title: In the Mountains・山の中
entry.content:
Looking southeast from my drone over the Katsura River. Center left is the Togetsu Bridge. In the distance upper left is Kyoto Tower.

この景色は、桂川の向こうにあるドローンから南東を見ています。 左中央が渡月橋。 遠くの左上が京都タワー。
entry.summary: Looking southeast from my drone over the Katsura River. Center left is the Togetsu Bridge. In the distance upper left is Kyoto Tower.

entry.title: Dusk at Yasaka Jinja・八坂神社の夕暮

link.title: Dusk at Yasaka Jinja・八坂神社の夕暮

entry.content:
Large shrines like Yasaka Jinja usually have a number of smaller shrines on the grounds. Behind the main shrine, here is another smaller shrine (Bigozensha Shrine) with it’s own torii gate.

八坂神社のような大きな神社には、近くに小さな神社もあります。 この小さな神社は「美御前社」です。
entry.summary: Large shrines like Yasaka Jinja usually have a number of smaller shrines on the grounds. Behind the main shrine, here is another smaller shrine (Bigozensha Shrine) with it’s own torii gate.

entry.title: Snow at Yasaka Jinja・雪の八坂神社

link.title: Snow at Yasaka Jinja・雪の八坂神社

entry.content:
The brightly lit lanterns of the Maidono central stage, with snow swirling in the air at dusk.

舞殿中央ステージの明るく照らされた提灯。 夕暮れ時には、雪が空を飛ぶ。
entry.summary: The brightly lit lanterns of the Maidono central stage, with snow swirling in the air at dusk.

entry.title: Inside the Pond・池の中
entry.content:
Long gone lotus plants create abstract lines, while clouds reflect above, and carp swim below.

蓮の植物は抽象的な線を描き、雲は上を反射し、鯉は下を泳ぎます。
entry.summary: Long gone lotus plants create abstract lines, while clouds reflect above, and carp swim below.

entry.title: Plum Garden・梅園
entry.content:
Early blooms in the Plum Garden at Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. Many trees are not in bloom yet, so the garden will look even better in two weeks time.

北野天満宮の梅園に早咲き。 まだ多くの木が咲いていないので、2週間で庭はさらに良くなります。
entry.summary: Early blooms in the Plum Garden at Kitano Tenmangu Shrine. Many trees are not in bloom yet, so the garden will look even better in two weeks time.

entry.title: Osawa Pond・大沢池
entry.content:
The pond at Daikaku-ji Temple has a new platform, just in time for spring.

大覚寺の敷地の大沢池には、春に間に合うように新しい池舞台があります。
entry.summary: The pond at Daikaku-ji Temple has a new platform, just in time for spring.

entry.title: Kamo River・鴨川
entry.content:
The Kamogawa River on the east side of Kyoto is in a more urban environment than the Katsura River on the west side, where I live. The Kamogawa provides a bit of nature in the otherwise dense population of shops, restaurants, hotels, and apartments in the area.

48 bridges cross the Kamogawa in total, from the mountains in the north down to Fushimi, where the Kamo River merges with the Katsura River. In the central area of Kyoto alone there are 13 bridges. The most famous is the one in the middle of this picture, the Sanjo Ohashi. It’s the final destination of Hiroshige’s well known The Fifty-Three Stations of the Tokaido, from 1833.

京都の東側の鴨川は、西側の桂川よりも都市環境にあります。 鴨川は、この地域のショップ、レストラン、ホテル、マンションの密集したところに自然を提供します。

鴨川は北の山々から桂川と合流する伏見区まで流れており、48の橋があります。 京都の中心部だけでも、13本あります。最も有名なのは、この写真の中央にある三条大橋です。 1833年に広重が描いた「東海道五十三次」の最後の絵です。
entry.summary: The Kamogawa River on the east side of Kyoto is in a more urban environment than the Katsura River on the west side, where I live. The Kamogawa provides a bit of nature in the otherwise dense population of shops, restaurants, hotels, and apartments in the area. 48 bridges cross the Kamogawa in total, from the mountains in the north down to Fushimi, where the Kamo River merges with the Katsura River. In the central area of Kyoto alone there are 13 bridges. The most famous is the one in the middle of this picture, the Sanjo Ohashi. It’s the final destination of Hiroshige’s well known The Fifty-Three Stations of the Tokaido, from 1833.

entry.title: Oi River・大堰川
entry.content:
West of the Togetsu Bridge, this portion of the Katsura River is known as the Oi River. This part is wide, calm and quite shallow. Peaceful on a sunny morning.

渡月橋の西側、桂川のこの部分は大堰川として知られています。この辺りは広くてかなり浅くて流れが緩やかです。晴れた穏やかな朝。
entry.summary: West of the Togetsu Bridge, this portion of the Katsura River is known as the Oi River. This part is wide, calm and quite shallow. Peaceful on a sunny morning.

entry.title: Yasaka Jinja・八坂神社
entry.content:
The Nishiromon Gate of Yasaka Jinja shrine in the late afternoon sunlight.

午後遅くの日差しの中、八坂神社の西楼門。
entry.summary: The Nishiromon Gate of Yasaka Jinja shrine in the late afternoon sunlight.

entry.title: Plums & Rakans・梅花と羅漢
entry.content:
Plum blossoms in front of the “Arashyama Rakans”, statues of enlightened buddhist sages in front of Hogon-in Temple.

宝厳院前の梅花と「嵐山羅漢」です。「羅漢」とは釈尊の弟子で崇高な修行者「悟りを得た人」を意味する。
entry.summary: Plum blossoms in front of the “Arashyama Rakans”, statues of enlightened buddhist sages in front of Hogon-in Temple.
